Package org.sibermatica.lang

Interface Drawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Forms
public interface Drawable

Drawable

This interface is used to implement on drawable objects such as Buttons, TextBoxes, TextFields, Labels, etc.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ciro Alejo Diaz
